body: This functions as the schism from the Cult Events section, except that the skills you can use to attempt to end it are Bluff, Diplomacy, Intimidate, and Profession (soldier), and that succeeding at the check means you lose 1 point of Labor and the event ends.
name: Schism
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime Events/Organization Events/Mercenary Company Events/Schism
